item.description:
Prestige Images Photography will be at the Oasis taking portraits of dogs and their families for the holidays. This is a great opportunity to have professional pictures taken of you and your dog. A portion of every portrait package sold on this day will be donated to Braveheart Rescue. Pictures will be taken by appointment only from 10-4. To schedule an appointment contact Amy Masterson via Facebook Message or E-Mail @ SCANONFITZ@GMAIL.COM.... There will be three options for this CASH AND CARRY event...1) 5 Poses on a CD and 1 8x10 and 1 5x7 for $50, 2) 2 Poses and 1 8x10 and 1 5x7 for $30, 3) 1 Pose 1 5x7 print for $10.

You MUST book an appointment time slot for this event to keep everything moving smoothly & safely! Visit the event page on facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/events/299840233463079/
item.name: Holiday Portraits at Alpha One K9 Oasis! Cash 'n carry!
